name: Hiraeth (Spark_Dev_Spring_2022)
description:
Hiraeth as in "longing for home". Hiraeth as in the main character in this story. In a universe where fantasies and species untold exist, the Hiraeth - a flame-like creature - crash lands upon a new and mysterious planet. The Hiraeth's journey throughout leads him to uncanny encounters, some friendly some foreboding. The future is unknown, and you the player are in control. 

Let us see how this story ends. 

Hiraeth has a mix of RPG (in which you can explore freely as you please), and fast-paced puzzle-based elements for the moments of battle. There are also key lore elements hidden throughout the game, so keep an eye out for those and try to find them all!
